uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.test.clustermanagement.distribution

Class Trackkeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.test.clustermanagement.distribution.Trackkeeper

  • public class Trackkeeper
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trackkeeper(int pSize)
      Generates a new trackkeeper that can keep account of where a packet with a certain sequence number is in the system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ackPacketAtPi(int n)
      Tell the trackkeeper that a packet with sequence number n has arrived at a pi

      Tell the trackkeeper that a packet of sequence number n has been generated
      void ackPacketReturned(int n)
      Tell the trackkeeper that a packet with sequence number n has arrived back at the clusterMaster

      check whether all packets arrived at a Pi
      boolean haveAllReturned()
      check whether all packets arrived back at the clusterMaster.
